title: 1.13.1 - Importing new chain segment insanely slow
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.13.1-stable`
CL client & version: lighthouse
OS & Version: archLinux

#### Expected behaviour
Geth should be able to follow the chain

#### Actual behaviour
After upgrading to 1.13.1 the "imported new chain segment" is insanely slow. Where I normally see 200+ mgasps, it is now down to `0.2` - `0.8` leading to geth being unable to keep up. The cpu usage is also high - up to spikes of `2200%`
